post:
Now is your chance to save 25% on all dedicated server offers and
join our reliable network in Vienna!

For extra convenience all of the servers come with remote-management/IPMI access.

MyRoot.PW offers Bare Metal Un-Managed Servers in central Europe
(Vienna/Austria). Delivery in less than 12 Hours!

**Coupon-Code: IsItSpringAlready**

==================>>Server Inventory:

**MR1**
C3558 (4c,4t)
32GB ECC RAM
1x 120 GB NVME
2x 4TB HDD (CMR)
5TB Traffic on 100Mbit/s Port (1x IPv4)
IPMI/HTML5 Console Available
=> ~~55~~ **41.25EURO per Month**  - [ORDER](https://myroot.pw/user/order/config/index/servers/?group_id=1&pricing_id=1&coupon=IsItSpringAlready "ORDER")

**MR3**
Xeon D-1540(8c,16t)
32GB ECC RAM
2x 4TB HDD (CMR), 7200 rpm
5TB Traffic on 100Mbit/s Port (1x IPv4)
IPMI/HTML5 Console Available
=> ~~70~~  **52.5 EURO per Month** - [ORDER](https://myroot.pw/user/order/config/index/servers/?group_id=1&pricing_id=3&coupon=IsItSpringAlready "ORDER")

**MR4**
Xeon D-1540(8c,16t)
32GB ECC RAM
2x 120GB SSD and 2x 1TB HDD
5TB Traffic on 100Mbit/s Port (1x IPv4)
IPMI/HTML5 Console Available
=> ~~70~~  **52.5 EURO per Month**  - [ORDER](https://myroot.pw/user/order/config/index/servers/?group_id=1&pricing_id=4&coupon=IsItSpringAlready "ORDER")
 
==================>>Add-on Pricing:
 
General:
* IPv4 Addresses: +1x ipv4.......+1.5 Euro /Month
* IPv6 => 1x /48 per customer .. FREE
* Upgrade to 10TB Transfer ......+10 Euro/Month
* Upgrade to 100 Mbit/s Unmetered Transfer ....+80 Euro/Month

==================>>Payment Options:

* PayPal
* Stripe
* Go-Cardless
* Wire-Transfer (via Transferwise, open a Support Ticket)
